files.patch:
@@ -995,1 +995,1 @@
-AC_DEFUN([JDKOPT_SETUP_JAVAC_WARNINGS],
+AC_DEFUN([JDKOPT_SETUP_JAVA_WARNINGS],
@@ -997,4 +997,4 @@
-  UTIL_ARG_ENABLE(NAME: javac-warnings-as-errors, DEFAULT: true,
-      RESULT: JAVAC_WARNINGS_AS_ERRORS,
-      DESC: [consider javac warnings to be an error])
-  AC_SUBST(JAVAC_WARNINGS_AS_ERRORS)
+  UTIL_ARG_ENABLE(NAME: java-warnings-as-errors, DEFAULT: true,
+      RESULT: JAVA_WARNINGS_AS_ERRORS,
+      DESC: [consider java warnings to be an error])
+  AC_SUBST(JAVA_WARNINGS_AS_ERRORS)
